text: Motion
Motion
Motion
â”€ So, the other day, we had a study session together!

Since everyone has different weak subjects,
both the teacher and the students participated!

That's nice!
Did Kaho become a teacher too?

Yes!
But, I'm not very good at teaching...

I was wondering if there was anything I could teach,
and then they said, "Teach us about being an idol".
I talked a little bit about work!

Oh...!
What did you talk about?

Things like what it's like at the agency,
and what we learn from our lessons...!

Oh! And I didn't mention anything about the work before
announcements! I didn't say anything I shouldn't!
It's okay!

Yeah, Kaho is reliable,
so I'm not worried about that.
Thank you for caring about me properly.
Hehe
Oh! I also talked about Producer-san!
Huh, me?

Yes! Because you sometimes come to pick me up from school,
I wanted to see you like that! I was curious!

Oh...! I see.
You're an unfamiliar adult, so you'd naturally be curious.

I had a lot of fun talking about Producer-san!
It was really enjoyable!
